definition[0]: bread-and-butter questions are very important basic ones
example[0]: bread-and-butter political issues such as jobs and housing
definition[1]: bread-and-butter work is work that is not very exciting but provides you with most of the money that you need in order to live
definition[2]: if something is your bread and butter, it is the thing that gives you your main income
